I think that sounds like a fantastic choice! A coral-colored necklace with a geometric design can add a wonderful touch of whimsy and playfulness to your outfit. The bold, bright color will create a beautiful contrast with the neutral LBD, and the geometric design will add some visual interest.

Here's why I think it will work well with your LBD and Jimmy Choo heels:

* **Coral and black are a great combo**: Coral and black are a classic color combination that can create a striking visual contrast. The bold, bright coral will draw attention to your upper body and create a beautiful focal point.
* **Geometric design adds visual interest**: The geometric design of the necklace will add some visual interest to your outfit, which can help break up the simplicity of the LBD. This can also create a nice conversation starter!
* **Jimmy Choo heels will still be the stars**: While the necklace will add a pop of color, the Jimmy Choo heels will still be the focal point of your outfit. The coral necklace will complement the heels nicely and create a beautiful overall look.

To make this outfit truly shine, consider the following tips:

* **Keep the rest of the outfit simple**: Since the necklace is bold and playful, keep the rest of the outfit simple and understated. Avoid adding too many other bold accessories or patterns, as this can overwhelm the outfit.
* **Add some subtle earrings**: Opt for simple, understated earrings that won't compete with the necklace. This will help create a more balanced look and prevent the outfit from feeling too busy.
* **Have fun with it!**: Embrace the playfulness of the necklace and have fun with the outfit! You can even add some subtle makeup touches, like a bold lip color or a fun eyeshadow shade, to enhance the overall look.

I think you'll look stunning in this outfit, and the coral necklace will add a wonderful touch of personality to your overall look!
